column4: the system time i.e in bios is different that what my ubuntu shows?
My ubuntu time and Bios time are different, How to set Biost time syc to ubuntu time ?
but why my bios and ubuntu time are different ?
which means that the system is sync to a time server. during shutdown, your bios will be updated
i think your question is confusing
you meant maybe timezone problem.. not the real time problem
possible also that when you boot to window, it uses utc or not uses utc while linux is using the opposite.
i have only hoary and fc3
make sure that both system agrees in setting utc or disabling it.
